message: I just installed CyanogenMod on my Motorola Droid 1. It's really given my phone a lease on life, but anyone can argue that probably any custom ROM would have done the same thing. It's really snappier and the extra options are sweet.
@FergatROn Agreed. I have CyanogenMod 7 RC1 on my Incredible, and I love it.

I'm still running LithiumMod on my Droid 1 because it seems to get much better battery life vs CyanogenMod. Software is fine, but I'm getting sick of the headphone jack simply not holding a connection by any stretch, the power button having broken and becoming difficult to press, and finally the battery seeming to hold less of a charge.
I got this guy on launch day (last Nov 6th) and was anticipating it for months, but it's starting to wear my patience.
Cyanogenmod 7 on my HTC Hero and it rocks
The latest Gingerbread from Peter Alfonso: http://www.peteralfonso.com/2011/03/download-stock-rooted-gingerbread.html
